AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: psychically gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a greater awareness of the unseen. After many years at the temple [PAWN_pronoun] learnt how to harness [PAWN_possessive] gift, and hear the whispers of the ancestors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Chimer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born long before the Great Betrayal, before the Dunmer even existed, possibly even before the pilgrimage to Resdayn. Needless to say, [PAWN_nameDef] is quite old.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child thief
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] quickly learnt [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for obtaining other peoples posessions, not legitimately of course. One fateful day [PAWN_pronoun] was so very close to being caught, and since then [PAWN_nameDef] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't take any more chances.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clone child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't exactly born like most others. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] was cloned by, and from, a rather high ranking member of Great House Telvanni. Inheriting quite a bit of [PAWN_possessive] fathers intellect, [PAWN_nameDef] was sure to follow in [PAWN_possessive] fathers footsteps.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: apprentice bonewalker creator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fascinated by the creation process of bonewalkers. Thanks to diligent study, [PAWN_pronoun] was given the chance to join an apprenticeship in Necrom, studying under a master bonewalker creator. Needless to say, [PAWN_nameDef] eagerly accepted the offer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: street kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] early life living on the streets. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly fell in with the wrong crowd, and wound up making some regrettable decisions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: raised by nords
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years in a nice little village in the Velothi mountains. Alas, that life came to an end one fateful day, when savage Nords attacked [PAWN_possessive] village. No one knows why, but [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] family by the invaders, and bought to Skyrim.

[PAWN_nameDef] started a new life there, and was taught many things by [PAWN_possessive] new family. Admittedly these things were mostly focused on how to best punch stuff, but [PAWN_nameDef] also picked up a dislike for wearing clothes.

Over time, [PAWN_nameDef] has become increasingly aware that [PAWN_pronoun] may in fact not actually be a Nord.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child slaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically born to be a slaver master. As soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could form coherent sentences [PAWN_nameDef] was bossing around the other children. Within a few years [PAWN_pronoun] had amassed a reasonable number of slaves, most of which were other children.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child prisoner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a certain day, to uncertain parents. As a prisoner [PAWN_pronoun] was taken to an unknown land, for an unknown purpose.
